# vImage.MultidimensionalLookupTable.InterpolationMethod

**Enumeration**

Describes the method a multidimensional lookup table uses the generate interpolated values between lookup table values.

## Declaration

```swift
enum InterpolationMethod
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **vImage.MultidimensionalLookupTable.InterpolationMethod.full**: Full linear interpolation.
- **vImage.MultidimensionalLookupTable.InterpolationMethod.half**: Partial linear interpolation between vertices on gray axis and `N-1` nearest vertices.
- **vImage.MultidimensionalLookupTable.InterpolationMethod.none**: Nearest neighbor.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable

items.description: Partial linear interpolation between vertices on gray axis and `N-1` nearest vertices.
items.name: vImage.MultidimensionalLookupTable.InterpolationMethod.half
